Package javax.transaction.cdi

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Transactional.TxType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TransactionalException
    RuntimeException used to rethrow Exceptions thrown from Transactional annotation interceptors implementation.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Transactional
    Annotation used by applications to control transaction boundaries on CDI managed beans, as well as classes defined as managed beans by the Java EE specification such as servlets, JAX-RS resource classes, and JAX-WS service endpoints, declaratively.
    TransactionScoped Deprecated
    remove deprecation when packaging is resolved
